artist: Artist: David Rathman; Author: Amos Tutuola; Publisher: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: Linocuts with letterpress on John Koller Special HMP handmade paper; housed loose in a black buckram and paper portfolio; artist's book. Portfolio cover also features a linocut on Japan paper by the artist. Adapted from Amos Tutuola's The Palm-Wine Drunkard, 1953.
title: Adventures in the Burning Bush
